# cmccloudv2_image (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get image by name
data "cmccloudv2_image" "window2016" {
    visibility = "public" # public, shared, private
    name = "Windows Server 2016" 
}

# get image by id
data "cmccloudv2_image" "window2016" {
    image_id = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `image_id` (String) Id of the image
- `name` (String) Filter by name of image (case-insenitive)
- `os` (String) Filter by os name of image (case-insenitive)
- `visibility` (String) Visibility of image, accept public/private/shared

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
